20110118020756.000|20110118020757.000|CC1|>> THE ROLE OF THE GRIOT IS ONE

20110118020901.000|20110118020902.000|CC1|THE FERRY ACROSS TO GOREE

20110118020903.000|20110118020905.000|CC1|IT'S JUST A 20-MINUTE JOURNEY

20110118020906.000|20110118020908.000|CC1|RETURN FOR FOREIGNERS.          
20110118020908.000|20110118020909.000|CC1|ISLE DE GOREE IS SAID TO BE A   
20110118020909.000|20110118020911.000|CC1|HAVEN OF TRANQUILITY AND A HUB  
20110118020911.000|20110118020913.000|CC1|FOR ARTISTS, BUT IT BEARS       
20110118020913.000|20110118020914.000|CC1|WITNESS TO A MUCH MORE SINISTER 
20110118020914.000|20110118020918.000|CC1|PAST.                           
20110118020918.000|20110118020919.000|CC1|GOREE ISLAND WAS A BUSY GOODS   
20110118020919.000|20110118020921.000|CC1|TRADING CENTER DURING THE 18th  
20110118020921.000|20110118020923.000|CC1|AND 19th CENTURIES, AND THAT    
20110118020923.000|20110118020924.000|CC1|INCLUDED THE TRAFFICKING OF     
20110118020924.000|20110118020928.000|CC1|HUMANS--SLAVES.                 
20110118020928.000|20110118020930.000|CC1|I'M VISITING GOREE ISLAND'S     
20110118020930.000|20110118020931.000|CC1|MOST POPULAR ATTRACTION--THE    
20110118020931.000|20110118020934.000|CC1|MAISON DES ESCLAVES, OR HOUSE   
20110118020934.000|20110118020936.000|CC1|OF SLAVES.                      
20110118020936.000|20110118020939.000|CC1|>> [SPEAKING NATIVE LANGUAGE]   
20110118020939.000|20110118020940.000|CC1|>> IT'S CLAIMED BY THE CURATORS 
20110118020940.000|20110118020942.000|CC1|THAT THIS HOUSE WAS USED AS A   
20110118020942.000|20110118020945.000|CC1|KIND OF HOLDING PEN FOR 150-200 
20110118020945.000|20110118020947.000|CC1|SLAVES BEFORE THEY WERE SOLD    
20110118020947.000|20110118020948.000|CC1|OFF AND SHIPPED AWAY TO THE     
20110118020948.000|20110118020949.000|CC1|AMERICAS.                       
20110118020949.000|20110118020951.000|CC1|>> ...IN 1776.                  
20110118020951.000|20110118020953.000|CC1|THE SLAVE TRADE LASTED 300      
20110118020953.000|20110118020958.000|CC1|YEARS FROM 1536 UNTIL 1848,     
20110118020958.000|20110118020959.000|CC1|DURING WHICH 15 MILLION OR 20   
20110118020959.000|20110118021001.000|CC1|MILLION BLACK PEOPLE COMING     
20110118021001.000|20110118021004.000|CC1|FROM ALL OVER THE WESTERN COAST.
20110118021004.000|20110118021005.000|CC1|[INDISTINCT] THE WESTERN COAST  
20110118021005.000|20110118021010.000|CC1|TO AMERI.                       
20110118021010.000|20110118021012.000|CC1|AND MOST OF THE TIME IN THIS    
20110118021012.000|20110118021013.000|CC1|SMALL HOUSE, ONE CAN FIND A BIG 
20110118021013.000|20110118021014.000|CC1|FAMILY, MOTHER, FATHER, AND THE 
20110118021014.000|20110118021017.000|CC1|CHILDREN LIVING SEPARATELY, BUT 
20110118021017.000|20110118021018.000|CC1|FOR GOING TO AMERICAS, IT WAS   
20110118021018.000|20110118021020.000|CC1|DEPENDING ON THE VALUE.         
20110118021020.000|20110118021021.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, FATHER TO          
20110118021021.000|20110118021024.000|CC1|LOUISIANA, UNITED STATES,       
20110118021024.000|20110118021027.000|CC1|MOTHER FOR BRAZIL OR CUBA, AND  
20110118021027.000|20110118021029.000|CC1|THE CHILDREN FOR ISLE           
20110118021029.000|20110118021031.000|CC1|[INDISTINCT]                    
20110118021031.000|20110118021036.000|CC1|THE SEPARATION WAS TOTAL.       
20110118021036.000|20110118021038.000|CC1|AND ALSO FROM THE DOOR LEADING  
20110118021038.000|20110118021039.000|CC1|TO THE BOTTOM, IT IS A DOOR OF  
20110118021039.000|20110118021041.000|CC1|THE VOYAGE WITHOUT RETURN.

20110118022102.000|20110118022105.000|CC1|>> YEAH. VERY BEAUTIFUL.

20110118022106.000|20110118022108.000|CC1|TOUBA IS A WORK IN PROGRESS.

20110118022112.000|20110118022115.000|CC1|>> EVERY YEAR THEY RENEW IT.    
20110118022115.000|20110118022115.000|CC1|YEAH.                           
20110118022115.000|20110118022118.000|CC1|THEY MAKE IT MORE BEAUTIFUL.    
20110118022118.000|20110118022121.000|CC1|AND THIS IS A VERY LARGE PLACE  
20110118022121.000|20110118022124.000|CC1|WHERE PEOPLE STAY TO SAY THEIR  
20110118022124.000|20110118022125.000|CC1|PRAYERS.                        
20110118022125.000|20110118022128.000|CC1|>> IT'S SO ORNATE.
